scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.internal-build: node watch.js once && node_modules/.bin/r.js -o baseUrl=js mainConfigFile=js/main.js name=main out=build/main.js paths.requireLib=vendor/requirejs/require include=requireLib optimize=none && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --comments --output build/weVisionWidget_internal.min.js build/main.js js/vendor/iframe-resizer/src/iframeResizer.contentWindow.js && rm build/main.js && cleancss -o build/weVisionWidget_internal.min.css js/css/*
scripts.build: npm run internal-build && npm run external-build
scripts.build-debug: node watch.js once && node_modules/.bin/r.js -o baseUrl=js mainConfigFile=js/main.js name=main out=build/main_debug.js paths.requireLib=vendor/requirejs/require include=requireLib optimize=none
